subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the historical significance of Chittorgarh Fort?
A_en: Strategic location on the Meera Road
B_en: Significant in the Battle of Chittorgarh
explanation_en: Chittorgarh Fort is considered a symbol of Rajput valor due to its crucial role in the defense of Rajasthan against numerous invasions.
